text:
@Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Covid-19 Update Tues 6/2

Closed cases 40%  up 1% in 24 hrs
Open cases  60%
Recovered 645,648
daily recovered 30,232
daily deaths 1,154

USA daily closed (31,386) exceed new cases (21,634) 
+9,752  (this is the first time two days in a row)
